column1: # Point Zero One Digital: Thumbnail Text Structures by Moment Type and Power-Word Combinations Tested for CTR
## Overview
This document outlines the structure of thumbnail text for Point Zero One Digital's 12-minute financial roguelike game
column2: focusing on various moment types and five new power-word combinations tested for Click-Through Rate (CTR). The goal is to create concise
column4: and deterministic text that accurately represents the game while maximizing user engagement.

column1: ## Non-Negotiables
1. Precise language: Use execution-grade language with zero fluff and an anti-bureaucratic tone.
2. Strict TypeScript: Never use 'any' in TypeScript. All code is strict-mode.
3. Deterministic effects: All game effects are deterministic to ensure fairness and reproducibility.
4. Production-grade: The thumbnail text structures are designed for production-ready deployment.
5. CTR optimization: Incorporate power-word combinations tested for increased Click-Through Rate.
